get.summary: URL for the client can start a new login with your IDP

parameters.name: return
parameters.description: URL to send the client after login or if client press the cancel button in case cancel parameter was not be set, but if this parameter is blank the token will be returned as json

parameters.name: cancel
parameters.description: URL to send the client if he press the cancel button

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: If the Identity Provider have multiple countries, this option is to tell him what country was chosen by the client

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Token created by one Identity Provider to login a client without send the client to him

daysWithTryAndBuy.description: Number of days that the user was with tryandbuy

access.description: This tell if the client has access to the request

idp_access.description: The response received from the IDP

This is for know from where us get the response
